author: Patch22
title: Great
review:
This is a pretty good set and the brain looks awesome and the sword is pretty cool too.

The brain would be good for a moc (my own creation) if you could find a helmet/mask to fit.

Pros

  • brain looks awesome
  • cool sword

Cons

  • none really

A very good set i'd give it 10/10 every thing you would want in a accessory pack.

 A good set i'd recommend it to anyone who likes hero factory.

author: ThoughtLash
title: Dark Brain and Sword
review:
Box/Instructions

It came in a simple polybag, with instructions on a small sheet. 

Parts

This set has great parts! The brain is really cool, and is great for kaiju. The pieces that make up the sword are nice for MOCs, mainly the large red blade and hilt.

Minifigures

No minifigs.

The build

Really simple, all you do is stick the 3-axle into the connector, plug the red blade into that, put a 2-axle into a fire piece and assemble it all.

The completed model

A sword and a Brain.

Overall opinion

Good set if you're a sci-fi fan, as the black Brain can be used for a lot of stuff. I would recommend it if you're a BIONICLE/CCBS builder.
